appearOnSupportersPage:
**Functional Purpose**: Checkbox label for appearing on supporters page
**UI Location**: Settings page, within the 'Account' or 'Privacy' section
**When Users See This**: When managing their profile visibility settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Appear on supporters page?"
handleForm.changeYourHandle:
**Functional Purpose**: Section heading for changing user handle
**UI Location**: Settings → Account page, 'Change your handle' section
**When Users See This**: When users want to update their public handle
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Change your handle"
handleForm.yourHandle:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the handle input field
**UI Location**: Settings → Account page, 'Change your handle' section, above the handle input
**When Users See This**: When users are about to enter their desired new handle
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Your handle"
handleForm.confirmYourPassword:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the password confirmation input field
**UI Location**: Settings → Account page, 'Change your handle' section, above the password input
**When Users See This**: When users are confirming their identity to change their handle
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Confirm your password"
handleForm.handleChangeRecommendation:
**Functional Purpose**: Informational message regarding changing handle
**UI Location**: Settings → Account page, 'Change your handle' section, below the password input
**When Users See This**: When users are considering changing their handle
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "We recommend only changing your handle in rare circumstances as public solution links will break, and it is confusing for mentors."
handleForm.changeHandle:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to submit handle change request
**UI Location**: Settings → Account page, 'Change your handle' section, at the bottom of the form
**When Users See This**: After entering new handle and confirming password
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Change handle"
handleForm.success:
**Functional Purpose**: Success message after changing handle
**UI Location**: Settings → Account page, 'Change your handle' section, after successful submission
**When Users See This**: Immediately after successfully updating their handle
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Your handle has been changed"
